        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2457</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Complete Metamorphosis in Insects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie Metamorphose in den Insekten durch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Terminez la métamorphose dans les insectes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termine o metamorphosis nos insetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Completi la metamorfosi in insetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλήρης μεταμόρφωση στα έντομα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termine la metamorfosis en insectos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of the complete metamorphosis of insects and its hormonal control.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metamorphosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insects</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation der kompletten Metamorphose der 
Insekte und seiner hormonalen Steuerung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation de la métamorphose complète des 
insectes et de son commande hormonale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation do metamorphosis completo dos insetos
e de seu controle hormonal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione della metamorfosi completa degli 
insetti e del relativo controllo ormonale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα της πλήρους μεταμόρφωσης των εντόμων 
και του ορμονικού ελέγχου του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación de la metamorfosis completa de 
insectos y de su control hormonal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
